title: Mod
description: A mod/mutator that can be applied to a game. Order matters - mods are loaded in sequence and later mods can override earlier ones.

archiveName.description: Archive filename from modinfo.lua (e.g., 'sphere-spawner.sdd'). Required for Spring script MUTATOR entries.

gitRef.description: Git commit hash or tag for precise version control. Used to verify exact version.

repository.description: GitHub repository URL (e.g., 'https://github.com/user/repo'). Used for downloading.

type.description: Source type. Currently only GitHub is supported.
